MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH5 postcode area of Connah's Quay, affecting properties in Hall Lane and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.13PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repairs required to an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.15AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.00PM on 28th January 2021.
